title: Alpha Client lag loading into champ select
body:
The alpha client seems to have a problem whenever i try and load into champ select, this is extremely frustrating as it only leaves me seconds to choose my champ and figure out what lane i am in. I am playing on a custom built gaming desktop so that is not the problem.

Does anyone have any advise in fixing it.

Also when i click launch legacy client it does nothing league of legends just closes.

replies.body:
What you're experiencing is a [**known issue**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-hot-issue-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client) in the Beta Client. We're still looking into the issue, but for now you should be able to workaround the issue by collapsing your friends list groups **before** queueing up for a match:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

If that doesn't work for you, let me know so we can get your Legacy Client functioning again so you can use that until the issue has been resolved.
